user_query: I want to surprise my mom by sending her a heartfelt WhatsApp message. Provide me with the product ID and webhook URL for my Maytapi WhatsApp account. Additionally, fetch the inbound message history from our sms77io account to keep track of the responses from my mom.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the product ID and webhook URL from the Maytapi WhatsApp account.
Send a heartfelt message to my mom via WhatsApp using the information retrieved from Maytapi.
Fetch the inbound message history from the sms77io account to track responses from mom.
